breeds.text: places where you wouldn't want to be stuck with your mom.
places where you do not want to fart.
ways to die in The Hunger Games.
words that come to mind when you hear "thick".
male names that start with the letter "c".
states in the United States of America.
things that start with the letter "p".
things that fit in a microwave.

barkOrBite.text: pretended to be more drunk than I actually was.
replied all to a group email by accident.
sat in the back of a cop car.
screenshotted someone's text and accidently sent it back to them.
spent more than $150 at the bar.
wet the bed after a night out.
worn fake glasses but they pretended they were real.
lied about a family member dying to get out of an obligation.
laughed so hard I peed my pants.
had to take the walk of shame.
thought a cartoon character was attractive.
hooked up with my friend's ex.
pledged to a frat or sorority.
cried to get out of a ticket.
dressed up for a movie release.
woken up not knowing where I was.

dogFight.text: shower at night or in the morning?
work from home or work at the office?
college is more fun than highschool. True or false?
breakfast is the most important meal of the day. True or false?
pineapple on pizza is amazing. True or false?
brunch is overrated. True or false?
long distance is easy with the right person. True or false?
staying friends with your ex is perfectly fina and healthy. True or false?
people that squeeze toothpaste from the middle are wasteful. True or false?
the best way to sleep is naked. True or false?
chocolate chip cookies are the best tasting cookie. True or false?
a period at the end of a text means you're mad. True or false?
making the bed is a pointless chore. True or false?
juice is better with pulp. True or false?
straws have two holes. True or false?
toilet paper roll facing forward or facing backward?
cereal is soup. True or false?
NASA has spotted aliens. True or false?

doghouseOrDare.text: read the last text you got.
re-dial your most recent caller and tell them "the deal is off - I'm making an Onlyfans."
sing your school song.
search "bitch" in your message and read the first text that pops up.
send a "I love you" text to your most recent group message.
send your significant other a text calling them the wrong name.
share an unpopular opinion you have.
share a secret you have kept from your parents with the group.
share with the group the meanest thing you have ever said to someone.
share your best pickup line with the group.
share your most embarassing memory.
share your guilty pleasure song with the group.
show the group the most embarassing photo on your phone.
show the group your camera roll content from last Halloween.
sing the chorus of your heartbreak song.
sit in a squat position for the next round.
share the most recent lie you've told with the group.
tell a short story in your best accent.
tell the group a bedtime story.
tell the group one of your biggest regrets from the past year.
tell the group what your worst habit is.
tell the group who you would want to switch lives with and why.
tell the story of your prom night.
text a family member "wanna fight?".
turn off your phone for the rest of the game.
with your mouth full of water or your drink, say your name.
talk without lcosing your mouth.
text someone using only your nose.
tell the group the last thing you searched for on your phone.
tell the group an embarassing story from your childhood.
bark every time someone swears until your next turn.
peel a banana and eat it using no hands.
tell the group the last thing you thought about while sitting on the toilet.
tell the group the story of your sexual awakening.
share with the group your most recent regrettable purchase.
tell the group what your first impression was of the person sitting to your right.
write your name on the floor with your tongue.
lift up the cushions of the nearest couch. If there is anything under them, you need to put it in your mouth.
have the player to your left give you something to drink. Slam it.
make sock puppets and reenact your first kiss for the group.

throwABone.text: have a docuseries made about their life
hire an escort for their highschool reunion
keep their socks on while having sex
laugh in the middle of a funeral
lie about their age
live in a tiny house in the mountains
lose their house playing poker
marry a drug lord
not say anything to a friend who has food in their teeth
not tell their parents that they have kids
outlive everyone in the room
not wear pants around the house
pretend to be gluten-free
quarantine for the rest of their lives
reinvent themselves in the next ten years
sleep until noon on a Monday
smoke weed with their kids
spell February wrong
spend over $5,000 on coffee in one year
stalk a celebrity
take PE class way too seriously
take public transportation to the hospital instead of calling an ambulence
tax evade
get buzzed after one glass of wine
bring in all of the groceries in one trip
turn themselves in for a crime
wake up married in Vegas
break a Guinness World Record
yell at the TV while watching sports
pay someone to do their laundry
fake it until they make it
fake their own death
be just like their parents
correct their boss' grammar
have a secret life in a different city
have a sketchy browser history
be a cool parent
eat the last piece of food
be eaten by a shark while skinny dipping
be mistaken for a celebrity

teachersPet.text: what was my first job?
what will it take to keep me in on a Saturday night?
what would I get arrested for?
what would I order to drink at the bar?
what would my last words be?
what would my stripper name be?
if there's always on thing in my pocket, what would it be?
what's my biggest pet peeve?
what's my dream job?
what's my guilty pleasure?
what's my least favorite nickname?
what's my love language?
what's the most embarassing thing my parents have caught me doing?
what's my favorite movie?
what's my guilty pleasure TV show?
what's the farthest I have traveled from my home?
what's the most I have ever lost at a casino?
what's the most trouble I've gotten in?
what's the name of my first kiss?
where did I think babies came from as a kid?
who's my celebrity alter-ego?
who's my celebrity crush?
who's my favorite athlete?
who's my favorite music artist/group?
who's my favorite superhero?
why am I such a lazy bum?
why was I crying last night?
if I had a boat, what would I name it?
what do I like most about myself?
if I had to change my name, what would I change it to?
what incredibly common thing have I not done?
what is my favorite month of the year?
what was my favorite toy growing up?
if I could time travel, when/where would I go?
what's my least favorite food?
if my life was a movie, what's a song that would be on the soundtrack?
what song do I have to sing along to when I hear it?
what is my favorite sleeping position?
if I could have dinner with any two people, who would they be?
how old was I when I found out Santa wasn't real?
